name: Adana Kebap
recipe: Spicy minced lamb grilled on skewers, typically served with lavash, grilled vegetables, and sumac onions.

name: Urfa Kebap
recipe: Minced lamb kebab without the spice of Adana, grilled on skewers, served with bulgur pilaf and fresh salad.

name: Chicken Shish Kebap
recipe: Marinated chicken breast cubes grilled on skewers, served with rice, salad, and grilled tomato.

name: Iskender Kebap
recipe: Thinly sliced döner served over pide bread, topped with tomato sauce, melted butter, and yogurt.

name: Mixed Grill Kebap
recipe: Combination of lamb chops, Adana, chicken shish, and kofte served with rice, salad, and flatbread.

name: Mixed Grill Kebap
recipe: Combination of lamb chops, Adana, chicken shish, and kofte served with rice, salad, and flatbread.

name: Mixed Grill Kebap
recipe: Combination of lamb chops, Adana, chicken shish, and kofte served with rice, salad, and flatbread.
